metadata.title: Our Story - How 3 Friends Built India's Most Loved Service Platform | KartSquare
metadata.description: From a midnight plumbing crisis to building KartSquare - discover the inspiring journey of 3 friends who solved India's biggest service booking problem. Join 50K+ happy customers today!

hero.title: The Story Behind Your Favorite Service App
hero.description: What started as a midnight crisis became India's most trusted service platform. This is the story of 3 friends who refused to accept that finding reliable help should be this hard.

originStory.title: It Started with a Crisis
originStory.crisisText: 2 AM, Bangalore. Yash's apartment was flooding. The pipe had burst, water everywhere, and he desperately needed a plumber. After 47 phone calls, 3 hours of waiting, and ₹2000 later, he realized something was fundamentally broken.
originStory.mainQuote: Why Is Finding Help So Damn Hard?
originStory.storyPart1: That night, Yash called his college buddies Ankit and Gaurang. They'd all faced the same frustration - unreliable contacts, hidden charges, no-shows, and zero accountability.
originStory.storyPart2: What if we could fix this for everyone? That question changed everything.
originStory.founderQuote: We weren't trying to build a unicorn. We just wanted to solve a problem that affected millions of Indians every single day.

journey.title: From Idea to Impact
journey.subtitle: Here's how three friends with zero funding built something that now serves thousands of families across India.

garageDays.title: The Garage Days
garageDays.description: 6 months of coding in Yash's garage. Living on Maggi and dreams. First prototype ready with 10 local service providers.

firstCustomers.title: First 100 Customers
firstCustomers.description: Word spread fast. Neighbors became customers, customers became advocates. We were solving a real problem.

growingImpact.title: Growing Impact
growingImpact.description: Today, we've helped 50,000+ customers find reliable services. From plumbers to party planners, we've got India covered.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.subtitle: Everything we do is guided by these core beliefs that keep us grounded and focused on what matters most.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Every decision we make starts with 'How does this help our customers?'

trust.title: Trust & Transparency
trust.description: No hidden fees, no fake reviews, no empty promises. Just honest service.

speed.title: Speed & Simplicity
speed.description: Life's complicated enough. We make getting help as simple as ordering food.

empowering.title: Empowering Providers
empowering.description: We don't just serve customers - we help service providers build better businesses.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: From founders to engineers to marketing - the passionate team building India's most trusted service platform.

yash.name: Yash Soni
yash.story: The guy whose flooded apartment started it all. Now he's obsessed with making sure no one else has to go through 47 phone calls to find help.

gaurang.name: Gaurang Tyagi
gaurang.story: The tech wizard who built our rock-solid platform. When others see problems, Gaurang sees elegant solutions waiting to be coded.

rahul.name: Rahul Chanchlani
rahul.bio: Rahul is a frontend and mobile engineer who loves building intuitive, high-performance apps with a user-first approach.

bhinsar.name: Bhinsar Jagdish
bhinsar.bio: Bhinsar is a backend and DevOps specialist focused on scalable systems, automation, and reliable infrastructure.

pratham.name: Pratham Mittal
pratham.bio: Pratham drives growth and brand strategy, blending creativity with data-driven insights to scale impact and engagement.

impact.title: The Impact We're Making
impact.subtitle: Numbers tell a story, but behind each number is a real person whose life we've made a little bit easier.

cta.title: Want to Be Part of Our Story?
cta.description: Whether you're a customer looking for reliable services or a professional wanting to grow your business, there's a place for you in the KartSquare family.

metadata.title: Contact KartSquare - Get Help & Support | Customer Service India
metadata.description: Need help with KartSquare services? Contact our 24/7 support team. Get instant assistance for bookings, payments, or service queries. We're here to help!

hero.title: Have questions? We're here to help.
hero.description: KartSquare is built to be easy, safe, and valuable for everyone. Reach out to us anytime — whether it's about our services, your account, or how we can make your experience even better.

contactInfo.title: Contact information
contactInfo.description: Have a question or need support? We'll respond quickly and guide you with care.

contact.title: Simplify your bookings. Get started with KartSquare today.

aboutKartSquare.title: Everyday services, just a square away.
aboutKartSquare.description: From beauty & wellness to home care and events — KartSquare makes it easy to book trusted professionals anytime, anywhere.

faq.title: Everything about KartSquare
faq.description: We believe booking services should be simple, safe, and valuable. Here are some frequently asked questions to help you trust and use KartSquare with ease.

easyToUse.question: Is KartSquare easy to use?
easyToUse.answer: Yes! KartSquare is designed with a simple and intuitive interface. Search, compare, and book services in just a few taps — no confusion, just convenience.

safeSecure.question: Is KartSquare safe and secure?
safeSecure.answer: Absolutely. We use secure payment gateways, verified service providers, and trusted reviews so you can book with confidence and peace of mind.

provideValue.question: How does KartSquare provide value?
provideValue.answer: KartSquare saves you time and effort by connecting you to trending services instantly. From real-time availability to exclusive offers, we make sure you always get the best deal and experience.

howItWorks.title: 3 Simple Steps to Get Any Service Done
howItWorks.mapDescription: No more calling multiple people, comparing prices, or worrying about quality. Just tell us what you need!
howItWorks.description: Whether you need a plumber at midnight or a chef for tomorrow's party, KartSquare makes it happen. Our smart matching connects you with the perfect professional in your area, handles payments securely, and ensures quality every time.

getInTouch.title: Ready to Make Your Life 10x Easier?

marquee.salon: ✨ BOOK YOUR DREAM SALON APPOINTMENT IN JUST 30 SECONDS!
marquee.plumber: 🔧 EMERGENCY PLUMBER? WE'VE GOT YOU COVERED 24/7!
marquee.caterer: 🎉 PLANNING A PARTY? FIND THE PERFECT CATERER TODAY!
marquee.cleaning: 🏠 HOME DEEP CLEANING STARTING AT JUST ₹499!

hero.title: Life's Too Short for Service Hassles
hero.description: From emergency plumbing to weekend parties, from home cleaning to personal tutoring — get trusted professionals at your doorstep in just one tap. Because your time matters!

kartSquareSolutions.title: Life's Too Complicated. We Made It Simple
kartSquareSolutions.targetDescription: Stop juggling multiple apps and contacts. Everything you need, one tap away.
kartSquareSolutions.description: KartSquare eliminates the frustration of searching endlessly, calling multiple providers, and worrying about trust or payments. Whether it's beauty, wellness, home services, or events — KartSquare brings everything under one secure and smart platform.

properties.title: Your Favorite Services, Just a Tap Away
properties.description: Skip the hassle of finding reliable people. These are the services our customers love most — vetted professionals, transparent pricing, and guaranteed satisfaction.

categories.title: Every Service You Need, Right Here
categories.description: From fixing your morning coffee machine to planning your dream wedding — we've curated the most trusted professionals across every category. No more hunting through contacts or taking chances with strangers.

wellness.title: Wellness & Personal Care
wellness.description: Salon at home, spa, massage, fitness trainers - all at your fingertips.

cleaning.title: Cleaning Services
cleaning.description: Deep cleaning, sofa cleaning, kitchen cleaning, pest control and more — all at your fingertips.

events.title: Events & Celebrations
events.description: Birthday planners, catering, photography, DJ & decorators and more — all at your fingertips.

astrology.title: Astrology & Consultation
astrology.description: Astrologers, tarot readers, vastu experts, numerology and more — all at your fingertips.

chefs.title: Personal Chefs
chefs.description: Hire chefs and catering for private dining and special occasions.

tutors.title: Tutors & Learning
tutors.description: Music, coding, language tutors, exam prep and more — all at your fingertips.

aboutKartSquareQuestions.title: What is KartSquare?
aboutKartSquareQuestions.heading: Why Waste Time When You Can
aboutKartSquareQuestions.description1: KartSquare makes life effortless by bringing **everyday services to your fingertips**. Whether it's fixing a leaky tap, getting a quick AC repair, booking a salon at home, or planning your next big celebration—KartSquare connects you with **trusted, verified professionals in seconds**.
aboutKartSquareQuestions.description2: No more long searches, confusing prices, or unreliable providers. With KartSquare, you get **speed, transparency, and peace of mind**—all in one square ✨.

bookSeconds.title: Book in Seconds
bookSeconds.description: Find and book services instantly with just a few taps

verifiedProviders.title: Verified Providers
verifiedProviders.description: All service providers are background-checked and verified

transparentPricing.title: Transparent Pricing
transparentPricing.description: No hidden fees. See exact costs upfront before booking
